snippet: The new Fox Sports 1 cable channel will present the basketball games of the seven Catholic universities taking over the Big East name, including Georgetown, St. John’s, Seton Hall and Providence.
abstract: Richard Sandomir TV Sports column discusses deal under which the new Fox Sports 1 cable channel will present basketball games of the seven Catholic universities that are taking over the Big East name.
lead_paragraph: The new Fox Sports 1 cable channel will present the basketball games of the seven Catholic universities taking over the Big East name, including Georgetown, St. John’s, Seton Hall and Providence.

headline.seo: Fox Sports and New Big East Are Teaming Up
headline.main: New Big East and Fox Team Up
headline.print_headline: New Big East And Fox Team Up
